  • Sweeter, Spicier!â€¯â€“â€¯Return to Los York with the original cast of Cupid Parasite, plus an all new-character Merenice Levin. Rendezvous with seven of the sweetest and spiciest bachelors in up to 3 game modes and unlock over 80 CGs, including some that may be too hot to handle!
  • In Sweetness and In Spiciness?!â€¯â€“â€¯You must choose the flavour of the next course. Will you go with the sweet? Or will you go with the spicy? When prompted with the choice during gameplay, select between sweet or spicy to impact the ending of your selected route. Manage to balance the flavours for a chance at something really appetizing.
  • Rich, Decadent Visuals and Savory Scenariosâ€¯â€“â€¯The original scenario writer and illustrator of Cupid Parasite return! Ririka Yoshimura (scenario writer) and Yuuya (illustrator) join forces once again to bring fans a delectable addition to the Cupid Parasite universe.
  • All Different Flavors to Choose Fromâ€¯â€“â€¯Pick from three different modes that can satiate anyone with a sweet tooth. Select â€œAfter Dramaâ€ mode to follow-up with the original Parasite 6 and pick up from where you last left off. Go with â€œNew Parasiteâ€ mode for a chance to experience Merenice Levins perspective of the events that take place after the common route of Cupid Parasite. You can also explore routes you unlocked in â€œBonus Episodeâ€ mode for six bonus episodes with their own unlockable CGs!

item.title: Reef Entertainment - Scar-Lead Salvation Xbox Series X
item.description:
Sie kÃ¶nnen Reef Entertainment - Scar-Lead Salvation Xbox Series X hier:

â„¹ï¸:

  • Expect the Unexpected â€“ Youll never know what comes next as you make your way through the military facility. Each floor will present a procedurally generated layout complete with new enemies to face and equipment to grab.
  • Unlimited Power! â€“ Dodge and parry enemy attacks with precision to build up Exo Force. When enough Exo Force is built up, unleash your ultimate power with Onslaught Mode and become temporarily invincible.
  • Live. Die. Repeat. â€“ Death may seem inevitable as you progress through the story, but its not the end. With each death youll resurrect where it all startedâ€”and maybe learn a little about what happened here in the process. Escape this loop and discover the truth about the military facility and Willows past!
  • Fully Armed and Operational â€“ Youll encounter a veritable armada of mechanical foes in the mysterious military facility. Use a variety of weapons, take advantage of status effects, and power up with unique skills to take them down.
